name: Tank vs Drone Shooter Battle
description:
In the Hyper Post modern Era, the war is coming and final combat is about to happen. And it seems there is only one latest hope for humans: you! Take part of this great casual tank game and endless flight war simulator, full of challenges and adventures, and defeat the enemies.

We are in 2457 and everything started in the early 2000 when drones came out. At that point, drones where just small inoffensive flying devices, which supposedly were going to help humans in logistics, photography and entertainment. However, the development of a super global artificial intelligence brought the whole control of drones to serve evil purposes: the dominance of the world.

The funniest thing about this story, starring by you, is that you need to become a shooter and your only weapon to make the war and defeat your powerful enemies is an old tank named The Mega Tank, that belonged to your granddad, who fought in Seoul battler in the Vietnam war.

Your goal is not only to survive and become an universal hero, but also to be a shooter and shoot and defeat those enemies drones that became powerful tools to control, threat and destroy humans (and their beloved pets) in an unprecedented war. But watch out, because not all drones are part of that terrible alliance and some of them are there to help you. So, be aware, only shoot same colors drones!!

So, what? Are you ready for this great simulator of an interplanetary combat against the evil? Are you ready to control an old tank and lead a flight war full of battles? Are you ready for this super fun casual tank game? The universe needs you!
